fields.name: The Pirate's Cave
fields.description: Help track down Prince Charlie, who has been captured by Dirty Dick and his pirates. This is a small, simple adventure suitable for younger folks or novice characters.
fields.intro_text:
Greetings, Adventurer!

Dirty Dick is the meanest pirate there ever was. He and his crew have kidnapped Prince Charlie. Dirty Dick and his crew left their ship at the Pirate Cave and went to town. You think it is a good time to check the cave and see if you can find Prince Charlie. There are also rumored to be a lot of treasures in the cave. Good luck.

fields.name: On a beach (N/S/W)
fields.description: You are on a beach by the ocean. There is a dock going south and a cave to the north. You can go west to go home.

fields.name: On the dock (N/S)
fields.description: You are on a dock. You can go north to the beach or south to a pirate ship.

fields.name: On the deck (N/U/D)
fields.description: You are on the deck of a pirate ship. The mast goes up and you can climb to the crow's nest, or you can go down into the hold. The dock is to the north.

fields.name: In the hold (U)
fields.description: You are in the hold of a pirate ship. There is a ladder nailed to the side so you can climb out.

fields.name: In the crow's nest (D)
fields.description: You are in the crow's nest. You can slide down to the deck if you want to.

fields.name: At the cave entrance (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in the first room of the cave. The floor is dry and covered with footprints.

fields.name: A huge room (N/E/W)
fields.description: This is a huge room. It looks like the pirates live here sometimes.

fields.name: A painted room (S)
fields.description: You are in a room with painted designs on all the walls. The person who did the painting was a bad artist.

fields.name: Dirty Dick's study (E)
fields.description: This is dirty dick's study. There is a big flat stone on the floor for a desk.

fields.name: End of dusty tunnel (S/E)
fields.description: You are in a dusty tunnel. It looks like it goes east for a while. South of here is the entrance room.

fields.name: A very dusty tunnel (E/W)
fields.description: This tunnel is very dusty. It looks like no one has been here for a long time.

fields.name: In the middle of the tunnel (S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in the middle of a very dusty tunnel. There are some footprints going south.

fields.name: A dirty dusty tunnel (E/W)
fields.description: The tunnel is dirty as well as dusty here. You can go east or west.

fields.name: The east end of the tunnel (S/W)
fields.description: This is the east end of a very dusty tunnel. If you go west you will go through the tunnel. You can go south into a room.

fields.name: A cave room (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a cave room. Someone has carved his initials in the wall. They read 'D.D.'

fields.name: The prison room (W)
fields.description: This room is used for a prison. The only door is on the west wall.

fields.name: A bend in the wooden tunnel (S/E/U)
fields.description: You are in a tunnel with wooden walls. It bends here. The tunnel goes south and a room is to the east. A ladder against the wall goes up.

fields.name: A low room (N)
fields.description: This room has a low roof so you need to bend to get in.

fields.name: The east end of wooden tunnel (N/W/D)
fields.description: The wooden tunnel goes north and west from here. A rickety stairway goes down.

fields.name: The middle of the wooden tunnel (E/W)
fields.description: This is the middle of the wooden tunnel.

fields.name: The east end of the wood tunnel (N/E)
fields.description: This is the east end of a tunnel. The walls are wood.

fields.name: The stair room (S/W/U/D)
fields.description: This room is not big but there is a stairway going up and down in the middle of it.

fields.name: At the bottom of the stairs (E/U)
fields.description: You are at the bottom of the stairs. A damp tunnel goes east.

fields.name: A damp tunnel (N/E/W)
fields.description: The tunnel is damp and water drips from the ceiling. You see a stairway to the west, or you can go north or east in the tunnel.

fields.name: A dry tunnel (N/S)
fields.description: The tunnel gets dry here. There are a lot of footprints here and all of them go north.

fields.name: The dungeon (S)
fields.description: This is the dungeon. The walls are solid rock.

fields.name: A wet tunnel (S/W)
fields.description: The floor of the tunnel is wet. You can go south to a stairway, or go west where it looks a like it is not so wet.

fields.name: The bottom of the stairway (N/U)
fields.description: A rickety stairway goes up from here or you can go north to a wet tunnel.

fields.name: The top of the stairs (N/S/W/D)
fields.description: You are at the top of the stairs. There are rooms north and west and a hall goes south.

fields.name: A big room (S)
fields.description: This is a big room that looks like it was used for someone's bedroom.

fields.name: A closet (E)
fields.description: This is a small room that is used for a closet.

fields.name: A hallway (N/S)
fields.description: There is a stairway to the north. The tunnel goes south.

fields.name: Bend in hallway (N/E)
fields.description: The hallway bends here. You can go east or north.

fields.name: A twisty tunnel (N/E/W)
fields.description: The tunnel is twisty here. You can go north or west in the tunnel or go east into a room.

fields.name: The treasure room (W)
fields.description: This is a plain room with white painted walls. There are lots of shelves to store things on.

fields.name: A hallway (S/E)
fields.description: The hallway bends here. You can go eastor south.

fields.name: The end of the hallway (N/W)
fields.description: This is the end if a hallway. You can go north to a small room or west following the hallway.

fields.name: A small room (S/D)
fields.description: You are in a very small room. There is a ladder going down.

fields.name: wooden chest
fields.description: You see an old wooden chest. The lock is broken.

fields.name: pistol
fields.description: You see Dirty Dick's favorite pistol. It is a mean-looking weapon.

fields.name: solid wooden door
fields.description: A solid wooden door blocks the way west.

fields.name: rusty key
fields.description: There is a small rusty key here.

fields.name: flashlight
fields.description: There is a flashlight on the floor here, with fresh batteries in it.

fields.name: medicine
fields.description: You see a bottle of medicine. The label says: 'Drink this to heal wounds'.

fields.name: note
fields.description: There is a note here that dirty dick was writing before he left.

fields.name: big knife
fields.description: You see Prince Charlie's big knife.

fields.name: club
fields.description: You see the troll's club.

fields.name: Prince Charlie
fields.description: Prince Charlie is here. He is chained to the wall and says "Please, help me."

fields.name: iron key
fields.description: There is a big iron key here, lying on the stone.

fields.name: iron door
fields.description: There is an iron door that keeps you from going north.

fields.name: fancy key
fields.description: You see a fancy key, with a jewel at the top.

fields.name: steel door
fields.description: There is a solid steel door in the wall on the east side of the passage.

fields.name: steel key
fields.description: You see a plain steel key.

fields.name: iron chest
fields.description: There is an iron chest here.

fields.name: queen's necklace
fields.description: You see the queen's necklace, covered with jewels.

fields.name: money
fields.description: There is a pile of money here.

fields.name: gold ring
fields.description: You see a pretty gold ring hiding on the shelf.

fields.name: treasure chest
fields.description: You see a big chest on the floor.

fields.name: pirate's treasure
fields.description: The pirate's treasure fills the chest.

fields.name: spear
fields.description: You see a plain spear. It belongs to Hector.

fields.name: mace
fields.description: You see Nick's mace.

fields.name: club
fields.description: You see the troll's club.

fields.name: rapier
fields.description: You see the pirate's rapier. It has some nicks in the blade.

fields.text:
Dear King,

Give me $1000 ransom money or you will never see Prince Charlie again.

Signed,
Dirty Dick

fields.name: Toby
fields.description: There is an enormous black and white dog here. He jumps and wags his tail when he sees you.

fields.name: Prince Charlie
fields.description: Prince Charlie jumps up and looks glad to see you. 'Thank you', he says.

fields.name: troll
fields.description: There is a big troll standing guard in here. He looks at you and says 'Goody, my lunch is here.'

fields.name: Hector
fields.description: You see a fierce fighter named Hector.

fields.name: Nick
fields.description: You see a strong fighter named Nick. He smiles when he sees you.

fields.name: rat
fields.description: You are attacked by a bunch of rats as soon as you come into the room!

fields.name: giant lizard
fields.description: Two giant lizards are here. They do not like the way you look.

fields.name: giant spider
fields.description: A giant spider has started to build a web here. It is big enough to eat you and that is what is wants to do.

fields.name: troll guard
fields.description: A big mean troll is standing guard here.

fields.name: pirate
fields.description: You see one of Dirty Dick's pirates. He is armed with a rapier.
